name: PartyTable
content:
Long ago the Party Gods looked down upon our world and said, "Hey, there needs to be more party down there." And so they chose Avatars to spread their gospel and bring forth the PARTY

Party Table stands as the champions of the Party Gods. They roam this land doing the one thing they do best, spreading the PARTY. Join them as they challenge the greatest contenders on the field of love and battle, create dazzling works from thin air, and... you know just do like goofy stuff. Give praise and PARTY FOR THE PARTY GODS!
